summary: Two new weapons, several new potions and powerful blessing effect.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ffff00][size=6][i][b]Forgotten Shrine of Magnus[/b][/i][/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=4][i][b]Version 1.0 Eng/Rus[/b][/i][/size][/center]

[size=3][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color] Ronnie Magnum
[color=#ffff00]Requirements:[/color] Skyrim

[center][size=5]***[/size][/center]
[color=#00ffff][i]Long ago, in the time of glorious heroes and great rulers, the cult of the Great Sun operated in Tamriel, enjoyed the people's respect and honor. They had the glory of a noble and righteous worshipers of Magnus, always acting for the good of ordinary people, not denying anyone for help and support. Legends say that members of the cult knew the secrets of miraculous elixirs, which they willingly shared with all who needed it. But after the Oblivion Crisis, in a fierce struggle against the horrible creatures of other worlds, the cult suffered heavy losses and could not regain its strength. Their time came to an end...

A few decades later Sinderion, famous master of alchemy, visited Skyrim in search for rare plants. He set himself the task of finding all information about the wonderful medicines that were at the disposal of the cult. Having collected all the information available in the state archives, he found a mention about one of the preserved sanctuaries of the cult of the Great Sun.[/i][/color]
[center][size=5]
***[/size][/center]
This mod adds two new weapons and several types of potions, some of which can be crafted. In order to find their location, visit [color=#00ff00]Belethor's General Goods[/color] in [color=#00ff00]Whiterun[/color] and buy the book [color=#00ff00]"A Treatise Of The Helioflos"[/color]. It contains clues to their whereabouts.

Or just check the screenshots to find out the exact location :)


[color=#ffff00][size=4]List of new items:[/size][/color]
[spoiler][/size][size=2][color=#ffff00][size=3]Weapons:[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00]Pilgrim's Defender[/color]
Type: Dagger
Base damage: 8
Improvement: 1x Quicksilver ingot
Enchantment: Deals 5 points of extra damage, ignoring armor. Increases the magic protection when equipped.

[color=#ffff00]Guisarme[/color]
Type: Technically a two-handed sword
Base damage: 18
Improvement: 1x Steel ingot
Enchantment: None


[color=#ffff00][size=3]Potions:[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00]Red Herbal Ichor[/color]
Effect: Restores 15 points of Health

[color=#ffff00]Blue Herbal Ichor[/color]
Effect: Restores 15 points of Magicka

[color=#ffff00]Green Herbal Ichor[/color]
Effect: Restores 15 points of Stamina

[color=#ffff00]Red Solar Elixir[/color]
Effect: Restores 75 points of Health and makes it regenerate 50% faster for 5 minutes
Recipe: 3x Red Herbal Ichor, 1x Moon Sugar

[color=#ffff00]Blue Solar Elixir[/color]
[size=2]Effect: R[/size]estores 75 points of Magicka and makes it regenerate 50% faster for 5 minutes
[size=2]Recipe: 3x Blue Herbal Ichor, 1x Moon Sugar[/size]
[color=#ffff00]
Green Solar Elixir[/color]
[size=2]Effect: R[/size]estores 75 points of Stamina and makes it regenerate 50% faster for 5 minutes
[size=2]Recipe: 3x Green Herbal Ichor, 1x Moon Sugar[/size]


[color=#ffff00][size=3]Plants:[/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00]
Red Helioflos[/color]
Loot: Red Herbal Ichor

[color=#ffff00]Blue Helioflos[/color]
Loot: Blue Herbal Ichor

[color=#ffff00]Green Helioflos[/color]
Loot: Green Herbal Ichor


[color=#ffff00][size=3]Extra:[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00]Shrine of Magnus[/color]
Blessing: Magicka increased by 75 points and regenerates 50% faster. Duration: 3 days[/size]
[/spoiler]
